abstract: S.& P. has been giving higher ratings than its big rivals to certain mortgage-backed securities just as Wall Street is eagerly trying to revive the market for these investments, according to an analysis conducted for The Times.
snippet: S.& P. has been giving higher ratings than its big rivals to certain mortgage-backed securities just as Wall Street is eagerly trying to revive the market for these investments, according to an analysis conducted for The Times.
lead_paragraph: The Wall Street ratings game is back.

headline.main: Banks Find S.&P. More Favorable in Bond Ratings
headline.print_headline: Banks Find S.&P. More Favorable In Bond Ratings

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
